phrs.translation: 三角帆美食酒吧及旅馆

sentences.sentence: As the race finally enters the South China Sea and takes advantage of the north east monsoon winds, the fleet will hoist spinnakers and charge towards a warm welcome in Asia.
sentences.translation: 当赛段最后进入中国南海之时，可以充分借助东北方向的季风，至此，船队将升起大三角帆全力驶向热情好客的亚洲。
